text: Kevin is interested in training large AI models.
He uses Hugging Face API for text generation tasks.
Kevin is exploring fine-tuning models with custom datasets.
He prefers concise and direct responses in conversations.
Kevin has experience in Python, Java, and Flutter development.
He is passionate about becoming a computer science expert.
Kevin aims to deploy AI-powered applications on local devices.
He uses a MacBook and plans to experiment with MPS (Metal Performance Shaders).
Kevin wants to integrate OpenAI and Hugging Face APIs in his projects.
He is learning how to create and train custom machine learning models.
